availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James W. Pearce (Henry County, Kentucky, postmaster and gentleman & postmaster)

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, postmaster and gentleman. Kentucky native. Son of Thomas Pearce, Sr. and Darcus Pearce. Gentleman in Henry County in 1860. Postmaster of New Castle in Henry County from January 6, 1860, to April 18, 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, New Castle, p. 247.
Record of Appointment of Postmasters, 1832-1971, NARA Microfilm Publication, M841, Records of the Post Office Department, Record Group Number 28, p. 318 of microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com).
